ps2.6:5.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ viharati isipatane migadāye.
ps2.6:5.3: Tatra kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi—
ps2.6:6.3: Yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṃhito;
ps2.6:6.4: yo cāyaṃ attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṃhito.
ps2.6:6.5: Ete kho, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
ps2.6:7.1: Katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati?
ps2.6:7.6: Ayaṃ kho sā, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
ps2.6:8.1: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ.
ps2.6:8.2: Jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, byādhipi dukkho, maraṇampi dukkhaṃ, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampicchaṃ na labhati tampi dukkhaṃ;
ps2.6:8.4: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ—
ps2.6:8.5: yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandirāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṃ—
ps2.6:8.7: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ—
ps2.6:8.8: yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo.
ps2.6:8.9: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ—
ps2.6:9.1: ‘Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:9.2: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyyan’ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
ps2.6:9.4: pariññātanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:10.1: ‘Idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:10.2: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahātabban’ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
ps2.6:10.4: pahīnanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:11.1: ‘Idaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:11.2: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabban’ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
ps2.6:11.4: sacchikatanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:12.1: ‘Idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:12.2: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvetabban’ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
ps2.6:12.4: bhāvitanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:13.1: Yāvakīvañca me, bhikkhave, imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ na suvisuddhaṃ ahosi, neva tāvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
ps2.6:14.1: Yato ca kho me, bhikkhave, imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ suvisuddhaṃ ahosi, athāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
ps2.6:14.3: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
ps2.6:15.2: Attamanā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
ps2.6:16.1: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne āyasmato koṇḍaññassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
ps2.6:17.1: Pavattite ca pana bhagavatā dhammacakke bhummā devā saddamanussāvesuṃ—
ps2.6:17.2: “etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
ps2.6:17.3: Bhummānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā cātumahārājikā devā saddamanussāvesuṃ …
ps2.6:17.4: cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā tāvatiṃsā devā … pe …
ps2.6:17.15: “etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
ps2.6:18.1: Itiha tena khaṇena tena layena tena muhuttena yāva brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchi.
ps2.6:18.2: Ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, appamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi atikkamma devānaṃ devānubhāvanti.
ps2.6:19.1: Atha kho bhagavā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi—
ps2.6:19.4: Iti hidaṃ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa “aññāsikoṇḍañño”tveva nāmaṃ ahosi.
ps2.6:20.1: “‘Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccan’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:22.1: Cakkhuṃ dhammo, ñāṇaṃ dhammo, paññā dhammo, vijjā dhammo, āloko dhammo.
ps2.6:22.2: Ime pañca dhammā dhammapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:22.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:22.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:23.1: Dassanaṭṭho attho, ñātaṭṭho attho, pajānanaṭṭho attho, paṭivedhaṭṭho attho, obhāsaṭṭho attho.
ps2.6:23.2: Ime pañca atthā atthapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:23.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:23.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:24.1: Pañca dhamme sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, pañca atthe sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.
ps2.6:24.2: Imā dasa niruttiyo niruttipaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:24.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:24.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:25.1: Pañcasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, pañcasu atthesu ñāṇāni, dasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:25.2: Imāni vīsati ñāṇāni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:25.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:25.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:26.1: “‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyyan’ti … pe …
ps2.6:26.3: pariññātanti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:28.1: Cakkhuṃ dhammo, ñāṇaṃ dhammo, paññā dhammo, vijjā dhammo, āloko dhammo.
ps2.6:28.2: Ime pañca dhammā dhammapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:28.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:28.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:29.1: Dassanaṭṭho attho, ñātaṭṭho attho, pajānanaṭṭho attho, paṭivedhaṭṭho attho, obhāsaṭṭho attho.
ps2.6:29.2: Ime pañca atthā atthapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:29.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:29.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:30.1: Pañca dhamme sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, pañca atthe sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.
ps2.6:30.2: Imā dasa niruttiyo niruttipaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:30.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:30.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:31.1: Pañcasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, pañcasu atthesu ñāṇāni, dasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:31.2: Imāni vīsati ñāṇāni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:31.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:31.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:32.1: Dukkhe ariyasacce pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:33.1: “‘Idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccan’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:33.4: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahātabban’ti … pe …
ps2.6:33.6: pahīnanti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi … pe …
ps2.6:34.1: Dukkhasamudaye ariyasacce pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:35.1: “‘Idaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccan’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:35.4: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabban’ti … pe …
ps2.6:35.6: sacchikatanti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi … pe …
ps2.6:36.1: Dukkhanirodhe ariyasacce pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:37.1: “‘Idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:37.4: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvetabban’ti … pe …
ps2.6:37.6: bhāvitanti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi … pe …
ps2.6:38.1: Dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ariyasacce pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:39.1: Catūsu ariyasaccesu saṭṭhi dhammā, saṭṭhi atthā, vīsatisataniruttiyo, cattālīsañca dve ca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:41.1: “‘Ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanā’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:41.4: Sā kho panāyaṃ kāye kāyānupassanā bhāvetabbāti me, bhikkhave … pe …
ps2.6:41.6: bhāvitāti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:42.5: ayaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassanāti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:42.8: Sā kho panāyaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassanā bhāvetabbāti … pe …
ps2.6:42.10: bhāvitāti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:43.1: “‘Ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanā’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi … pe …
ps2.6:43.5: sā kho panāyaṃ kāye kāyānupassanā bhāvetabbāti … pe …
ps2.6:43.7: bhāvitāti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:45.1: Cakkhuṃ dhammo, ñāṇaṃ dhammo, paññā dhammo, vijjā dhammo, āloko dhammo.
ps2.6:45.2: Ime pañca dhammā dhammapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:45.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:45.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:46.1: Dassanaṭṭho attho, ñātaṭṭho attho, pajānanaṭṭho attho, paṭivedhaṭṭho attho, obhāsaṭṭho attho.
ps2.6:46.2: Ime pañca atthā atthapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:46.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:46.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:47.1: Pañca dhamme sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, pañca atthe sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.
ps2.6:47.2: Imā dasa niruttiyo niruttipaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:47.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:47.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:48.1: Pañcasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, pañcasu atthesu ñāṇāni, dasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:48.2: Imāni vīsati ñāṇāni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:48.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:48.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:49.1: Kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhāne pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:50.5: ayaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassanāti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi … pe …
ps2.6:50.9: sā kho panāyaṃ dhammesu dhammānupassanā bhāvetabbāti … pe …
ps2.6:50.11: bhāvitāti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi … pe …
ps2.6:51.1: Dhammesu dhammānupassanā satipaṭṭhāne pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:52.1: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu saṭṭhi dhammā, saṭṭhi atthā, vīsatisataniruttiyo, cattālīsañca dve ca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:54.1: “Ayaṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādoti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:54.4: So kho panāyaṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti me, bhikkhave … pe …
ps2.6:54.6: bhāvitoti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:55.5: ayaṃ vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādoti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:55.8: So kho panāyaṃ vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:56.1: “‘Ayaṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo’ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi … pe …
ps2.6:56.5: so kho panāyaṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti … pe …
ps2.6:56.7: bhāvitoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:58.1: Cakkhuṃ dhammo, ñāṇaṃ dhammo, paññā dhammo, vijjā dhammo, āloko dhammo.
ps2.6:58.2: Ime pañca dhammā dhammapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:58.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:58.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:59.1: Dassanaṭṭho attho, ñātaṭṭho attho, pajānanaṭṭho attho, paṭivedhaṭṭho attho, obhāsaṭṭho attho.
ps2.6:59.2: Ime pañca atthā atthapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:59.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:59.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:60.1: Pañca dhamme sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, pañca atthe sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.
ps2.6:60.2: Imā dasa niruttiyo niruttipaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:60.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:60.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:61.1: Pañcasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, pañcasu atthesu ñāṇāni, dasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:61.2: Imāni vīsati ñāṇāni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇā ceva honti gocarā ca.
ps2.6:61.3: Ye tassā ārammaṇā te tassā gocarā.
ps2.6:61.4: Ye tassā gocarā te tassā ārammaṇā.
ps2.6:62.1: Chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgate iddhipāde pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:63.5: ayaṃ vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi … pe …
ps2.6:63.9: so kho panāyaṃ vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo bhāvetabboti … pe …
ps2.6:63.11: bhāvitoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi … pe …
ps2.6:64.1: Vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgate iddhipāde pannarasa dhammā, pannarasa atthā, tiṃsa niruttiyo, saṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:65.1: Catūsu iddhipādesu saṭṭhi dhammā, saṭṭhi atthā, vīsatisataniruttiyo, cattālīsañca dve ca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:67.1: “‘Samudayo samudayo’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:67.4: ‘Nirodho nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:67.7: Vipassissa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:68.1: “‘Samudayo samudayo’ti kho, bhikkhave, sikhissa bodhisattassa … pe …
ps2.6:68.9: kassapassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:68.12: ‘Nirodho nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, kassapassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:68.15: Kassapassa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:69.1: “‘Samudayo samudayo’ti kho, bhikkhave, gotamassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi.
ps2.6:69.4: ‘Nirodho nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, gotamassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:69.7: Gotamassa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:70.1: Sattannaṃ bodhisattānaṃ sattasu veyyākaraṇesu sattati dhammā, sattati atthā, cattālīsasataṃ niruttiyo, asīti ca dve ca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:72.1: “‘Yāvatā abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:72.3: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:72.4: Abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:73.7: yāvatā sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:73.9: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:73.10: Sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:74.1: Abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭhe, pariññāya pariññaṭṭhe, pahānāya pahānaṭṭhe, bhāvanāya bhāvanaṭṭhe, sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭhe pañcavīsasataṃ dhammā, pañcavīsasataṃ atthā, aḍḍhateyyāni niruttisatāni, pañca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:76.1: “‘Yāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:76.3: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:76.4: Khandhānaṃ khandhaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:77.7: yāvatā asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:77.12: Asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:78.1: Khandhānaṃ khandhaṭṭhe, dhātūnaṃ dhātuṭṭhe, āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhe saṅkhatānaṃ saṅkhataṭṭhe, asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭhe pañcavīsatisataṃ dhammā, pañcavīsatisataṃ atthā, aḍḍhateyyāni niruttisatāni, pañca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:80.1: “‘Yāvatā dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:80.3: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:80.4: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:81.5: yāvatā maggassa maggaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:81.10: Maggassa maggaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:82.1: Catūsu ariyasaccesu sataṃ dhammā, sataṃ atthā, dve niruttisatāni, cattāri ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:84.1: “‘Yāvatā atthapaṭisambhidāya atthapaṭisambhidaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:84.6: Atthapaṭisambhidāya atthapaṭisambhidaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:85.5: yāvatā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:85.10: Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:86.1: Catūsu paṭisambhidāsu sataṃ dhammā, sataṃ atthā, dve niruttisatāni, cattāri ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:88.1: “‘Yāvatā indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṃ, ñātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ phassitaṃ paññāya.
ps2.6:88.6: Indriyaparopariyattañāṇe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:89.9: yāvatā anāvaraṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ phassitaṃ paññāya.
ps2.6:89.11: cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:89.12: Anāvaraṇe ñāṇe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṃ niruttiyo, sataṃ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:90.1: Chasu buddhadhammesu diyaḍḍhasataṃ dhammā, diyaḍḍhasataṃ atthā, tīṇi niruttisatāni, cha ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:91.1: Paṭisambhidādhikaraṇe aḍḍhanavadhammasatāni, aḍḍhanavaatthasatāni, niruttisahassañca satta ca niruttisatāni, tīṇi ca ñāṇasahassāni, cattāri ca ñāṇasatānīti.
